verses.name: 2 Kings 9:30
verses.text: And when Jehu was come to Jezreel, Jezebel heard of it; and she painted her face, and tired her head, and looked out at a window.

verses.name: 2 Kings 9:31
verses.text: And as Jehu entered in at the gate, she said, Had Zimri peace, who slew his master?

verses.name: 2 Kings 9:32
verses.text: And he lifted up his face to the window, and said, Who is on my side? who? And there looked out to him two or three eunuchs.
